We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

item.title: [Global][Storage] - Volume Snapshot incident notification
item.description:
Feb 17, 15:19 UTC
Investigating - We had an incident affecting our storage offer, which has caused temporary availability issues
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved
Please find the details:

Start Time : 12/02/2025 10:00 UTC
End Time : 13/02/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Volume snapshots created during the issue window were stuck in status creating.
Root cause : Software malfunction

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [VIE][Public Cloud] - Local Zone incident notification
item.description:
Feb 13, 21:29 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our Local Zone offer in Vienna has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 13/02/2025 18:00 UTC
End time : 13/02/2025 21:26 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Feb 13, 18:47 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Public Cloud offer.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 13/02/2025 18:00 UTC
Customers Impact : Customers are not able to create new instances in the local zone Vienna, but they have no impact on the instances that already exist.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Feb 13, 18:05 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Public Cloud offer.

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [SBG][Object Storage] - Object Storage Standard/High Performance incident notification

Root Cause : This incident was caused by software issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Feb 13, 11:10 UTC
Monitoring - We have experienced an incident affecting our storage offering which has caused temporary availability issues in the SBG region. Service is now reachable since 09:50 UTC.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 13/02/2025 08:16 UTC
Impacted Service : Object storage S3 has been unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers have been experiencing http 503 errors when trying to access their objects.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by software issue.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are monitoring the situation.

We will keep you updated on the resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Feb 13, 10:39 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Object Storage S3 offer.
Start time : 13/02/2025 08:16 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.
